chunk_analysis.page_text:
KNOW ALL MEN BY THESE PRESENTS: That we, Chancellor L. Jones and Mary A. Jones, husband and wife, and Francis D. Jones and Nellie Jones, husband and wife, the grantors

In consideration of Twelve hundred dollars ($1200.00)
to us paid by Thomas A. Jones, the grantee

The receipt whereof is hereby acknowledged, do hereby Grant, Bargain, Sell and Convey to the said 
Grantee his heirs and assigns forever

All our interest in the following described real estate, namely, the two sevenths of the undivided one half interest in two tracts of land situate in the Township of Willey in the County of Monongalia and state of Ohio, to wit: twenty and 88/100 acres, thirteen and 88/100 acres of which are in the northwest part of the northwest quarter of section twenty three(23) township and range two, and seven acres being in the southwest quarter of section eleven(11), township and range aforesaid, beginning at a stone at the northwest corner of said section twenty three; thence south with line south twenty six degrees east seventy four and 88/100 rods to the southeast side of the road; thence north sixty four and three fourths degrees west sixty and 50/100 rods; thence to a post on the road on the west line of section seven; thence with said line south no degrees west five and 95/100 rods to place of beginning, containing twenty and 88/100 acres. Also, one half interest in six acres in the west line of said section twenty three, being part of the northwest corner of said quarter, described as follows: beginning at the northwest corner of said quarter; thence east fifty five and one half rods; thence south forty rods to the place of beginning. Also fifty acres in the southwest corner of the southwest quarter of section eleven(11), township and range two, beginning at a stone at the southwest corner; thence north seventy five rods; thence north one hundred six and two thirds rods; thence south seventy five rods; thence east on the line between eleven and twenty to the place of beginning containing fifty acres more or less. Also seven and 68/100 acres in the southwest quarter of section eleven township two, range two, beginning on the south line of Draggos land fifty five and one half rods east of the northwest corner of southwest quarter of section eleven to a stone at the southwest corner; thence with Cunninghams line south three degrees and thirty eight minutes west forty and 75/100 rods to a stone in the south side of the Washington road; thence along said road south sixty six degrees east twenty nine rods; thence north three degrees and thirty eight minutes east fifty four and 12/100 rods to said Draggos line; thence with said line south eighty seven degrees east to the place of beginning, containing seven and 68/100 acres. Excepting and reserving therefrom the coal and mining rights reserved by J. N. Willey and recorded in deed book No. 119 page 593, Monongalia County, Indiana and excepting the right of way granted to B & O Railroad Company.

[Standard deed language regarding privileges and appurtenances follows]

Signed and acknowledged in the presence of-
Elias C. Tennant
Elias C. Tennant
Elias C. Tennant
Elias C. Tennant

Chancellor L. Jones
Mary A. Jones
Francis D. Jones
Nellie Jones

STATE OF West Virginia, COUNTY OF Monongalia ss:

[Notary acknowledgment follows with date of April fourteenth, 1914]

Transfer Not necessary.
Filed Dec.12,1916 at 9.40 A.M.
Recorded Dec/2,1916.
Fee 90¢

Attest: G. F. Henry, County Recorder
